wines.name: Château Margaux 2015
wines.description: An exceptional Bordeaux wine from one of the most prestigious châteaux in the Margaux appellation.
wines.tastingNotes: Rich aromas of blackcurrant, cedar, and violets. Full-bodied with velvety tannins and a long, elegant finish.

wines.name: Cloudy Bay Sauvignon Blanc 2022
wines.description: A benchmark New Zealand Sauvignon Blanc with vibrant fruit flavors and crisp acidity.
wines.tastingNotes: Tropical fruit, passion fruit, and citrus notes with hints of fresh herbs. Crisp and refreshing with a zesty finish.

wines.name: Barolo Riserva Monfortino 2013
wines.description: One of Italy's most legendary wines, produced only in exceptional vintages.
wines.tastingNotes: Complex aromas of tar, roses, dark cherry, and truffle. Powerful structure with firm tannins and incredible aging potential.

wines.name: Moët & Chandon Impérial Brut
wines.description: The world's most loved champagne, perfect for any celebration.
wines.tastingNotes: Fresh green apple, citrus, and brioche with fine bubbles. Elegant and well-balanced with a creamy texture.

wines.name: Opus One 2018
wines.description: A legendary Napa Valley wine from the collaboration between Robert Mondavi and Baron Philippe de Rothschild.
wines.tastingNotes: Blackberry, cassis, and dark chocolate with hints of espresso. Full-bodied with silky tannins and a luxurious finish.

wines.name: Whispering Angel Rosé 2023
wines.description: The iconic pale rosé from Provence, perfect for warm summer days.
wines.tastingNotes: Delicate notes of strawberry, melon, and citrus. Light and refreshing with a crisp, clean finish.

wines.name: Penfolds Grange 2017
wines.description: Australia's most celebrated wine, an icon of the New World.
wines.tastingNotes: Rich blackberry, plum, and dark chocolate with notes of vanilla and spice. Powerful and concentrated with exceptional depth.

wines.name: Chablis Grand Cru Les Clos 2020
wines.description: The finest expression of Chablis from the most prestigious Grand Cru vineyard.
wines.tastingNotes: Mineral-driven with flavors of green apple, lemon, and oyster shell. Crisp acidity with a long, pure finish.

wines.name: Rioja Gran Reserva 904 2011
wines.description: A classic Rioja Gran Reserva from La Rioja Alta, aged to perfection.
wines.tastingNotes: Elegant notes of red cherry, vanilla, tobacco, and leather. Medium-bodied with soft tannins and a long finish.

wines.name: Dom Pérignon Vintage 2012
wines.description: The ultimate prestige champagne, produced only in exceptional years.
wines.tastingNotes: Complex aromas of white flowers, citrus, and brioche. Creamy texture with fine bubbles and a mineral finish.

wines.name: Riesling Spätlese Wehlener Sonnenuhr 2021
wines.description: An exquisite German Riesling from one of the Mosel's most famous vineyards.
wines.tastingNotes: Aromatic with flavors of peach, apricot, and honey. Off-dry with vibrant acidity and a lingering mineral finish.

wines.name: Miraval Rosé 2023
wines.description: A premium Provence rosé from the famous Château Miraval estate.
wines.tastingNotes: Fresh notes of red berries, citrus, and white flowers. Crisp and elegant with a refreshing finish.
